data.text: Get the inside scoop on the top UK Employers! Read this extended excerpt of the Vault Guide to the Top UK Employers, 2009 Edition and get the inside story on 50+ employerss, including: • Up-to-date overview and analysis of the UK’s key employment sectors • Employee opinions on hours, perks, diversity and company culture • Detailed profiles of the UK’s top firms • Tips about the hiring process This PDF is an excerpted version of the guide. Your university career center subscribes to the Vault Online Library, which provides students with FREE access to the complete guide, as well as: • Downloadable PDF versions of 70+ Vault career guides, such as the Vault Career Guide to Investment Banking, the Vault Guide to Finance Interviews, the Vault Career Guide to Consulting, and many more • Employer profiles of 5,500+ top employers • 1,000s of career advice articles, including sample CVs, sample cover letters and more Contact your career center today to find out how to access the Vault Online Career Library. To purchase your own print copy of the guide, go to www.vault.com/europe. ABOUT VAULT Founded in 1996, Vault is the leading global media company focused on careers. With offices in North America, Europe, Asia and India, Vault provides graduates and young professionals worldwide with insider information on careers and education.
